title: Rs 2.24 Lakh Crore I-T Refunds Issued In FY22: Finance Ministry - NDTV Profit
content: Rs 2.24 Lakh Crore I-T Refunds Issued In FY22: Finance Ministry  NDTV Profit
description: The finance ministry on Friday said over 22 per cent of the verified returns were processed on the same day, while the overall average processing time was only 26 days for ITR assessments in the last fiscal year.
